spell_list.description: Doubles the effectiveness of the Animalist's shield. All area effect abilities that do not directly target the Animalist's group are avoided and increases their health regeneration, as long as they are near the Animalist.  If the caster enters PVP combat, the duration of this effect will be reduced.
spell_list.description_pvp: Doubles the effectiveness of the Animalist's shield. All area effect abilities that do not directly target the Animalist's group are avoided and increases their health regeneration, as long as they are near the Animalist.  If the caster enters PVP combat, the duration of this effect will be reduced.

effect_list.description: Increases In-Combat Health Regeneration of group members (AE) by 4.0
Increases Combat HP Regen of group members (AE) by 50.0%
Increases group members (AE)'s chance to block by 100.0%

spell_list.name: Tortoise Shell
